Title: The Shirt Contest
Plot: The boys are on pins and needles when Kenny, Mike, Brendan and Bobby decide to compete in a shirt creation contest. The stakes are high as the prize for the winner is free drinks for a month. Meanwhile, PJ is hoping to write a book about a baseball player, Andy spends long hours at his job, and Brendan wants to learn to become a bartender.
GuestStars: Mini Anden, Hayes MacArthur, Lindsey Stoddart, Jay Tarses
